thread.title: Kuwait- High humidity to continue till Friday - weather forecast official
thread.title_full: Kuwait- High humidity to continue till Friday - weather forecast official | MENAFN.COM

author: Kuwait News Agency (KUNA)
title: Kuwait- High humidity to continue till Friday - weather forecast official
text:
(MENAFN - Kuwait News Agency (KUNA)) High humidity is expected to continue in Kuwait till Friday and may go down on Saturday with the possibility of a temperature increase, said a weather forecast official here Thursday.
Head of Kuwait weather forecast department, Mohammad Karam told KUNA that humidity was at 95 percent in some areas of Kuwait due to southeastern winds.
The current humid and hot weather will continue throughout Friday with high temperatures reaching between 40 to 42 degrees, said Karam, adding humidity will hopefully go down by Saturday; however, the temperature will remain high.
